import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'},body:new URLSearchParams({email,password})});if(response.ok){const userData={name:email.split('@')[0],// Use email prefix as name
email};localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(userData));navigate('/dashboard');}else{setError('Invalid credentials');}}catch(err){setError('Login failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded-lg shadow-md w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Login"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-500 mb-4",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded mb-2",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"w-full p-2 border border-gray-300 rounded mb-4",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-blue-600 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mt-4 text-center",children:["Don't have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/signup",className:"text-blue-600",children:"Sign up"})]})]})});};export default Login;
